meanings.definition: Relating to or causing sexual arousal or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The erogenic touch of a feather can be very exciting.
meanings.sent2: She found the erogenic areas of his body with ease.
meanings.sent3: The erogenic music made everyone dance with joy.
meanings.sent4: His words had an erogenic effect on her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The erogenic scent of the perfume lingered in the room.

meanings.definition: Capable of producing sexual excitement or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The erogenic scenes in the movie were intense.
meanings.sent2: The erogenic toys added fun to their relationship.
meanings.sent3: The erogenic dessert was the highlight of the meal.
meanings.sent4: The erogenic atmosphere of the party was undeniable.
meanings.sent5: The erogenic touch of silk against her skin was delightful.
